TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxInclusive5 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxInclusive-5.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with maxInclusive value 32767.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-5.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxInclusive-5-1.xml document which specifies valid value -32768 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-5 element, sets the values: -32768, -70, 0, 70, 32767 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxInclusive-5.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxInclusive-5 type, sets the values: -32768, -70, 0, 70, 32767 and expects the validation to pass.
